name: Description
info:
## Description
 This group performs two main tasks: 
 - Process and display BME readings received via websocket.
 - Thermostat control.
 ### User inputs:
    - Thermostat deadband.
    - Thermostat control.
    - BME interval.
    - Trigger BME reading.
    - Switch bolier on/off.
    - Local elevation for Sea Level Pressure.
 
 ## BME Readings:
 1. Process incoming message from ESP:
   - Identify BME Readings (P, T, H, err).
   - Scale magnitudes and calculate Sea Level Pressure.

 2. ### Display BME Readings.
    - BME current values --> gauge.
    - BME historic data --> chart.

 ## Thermostat control 
 - User interface for deadband and temperature setpoint
 - Create context-scope variables for temperature, deadband and setpoint.
 - Define Heater output and send out.

name: Description
info:
ESP Controls:
Switches to control ESP built-in LED and debug mode.
Buttons to command reboot, OTA upgrade, Wifi reset and BME Read
Signals sent via MQTT protocol to ESP device.
The topic is: esp/xxx
The ESP will use the topic to identify the task.
Signals are sent to the "MQTT Send" group to be broadcasted.

rules.to:
'
✅ Wifi Cleared. Reboot ESP for changes to take effect. Connect to ssid: "ESP WIFI MANAGER", url: 192.168.4.1 and set new credentials
'

name: Get BME Readings
Description
info:
1. ### Process feedback from ESP:
    - GPIO # and state
    - BME Interval
    - Debug
    - ESP IP
    - Host IP
    - BME Health
